DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Trial Data Collection Contact Person Name
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A text response used to identify the person acting as a channel of communication between groups that with be gathering data for testing or research purposed for a research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes.
